author: Nicola Agius
title: Chloe Ferry asks Jamie O'Hara if she can see his penis in shocking Celebrity Big Brother scenes
text:
Chloe Ferry asks Jamie O'Hara if she can see his penis in shocking Celebrity Big Brother scenes The star has already been upsetting viewers with her vulgar antics Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Chloe Ferry strips naked on her first night in the house Share this video Get celebs   Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Chloe Ferry has already upset some Celebrity Big Brother fans with her vulgar behaviour. 
And in scenes which will be aired on Channel 5 tonight, the reality star's antics get even worse when she asks Jamie O'Hara if she can see his penis. 
While in the hot tub with new pal Jessica Cunningham , Jamie walks past with his ripped torso on show. 
The Apprentice star then tries to touch his abs but as he walks off, Chloe reveals she has more on her mind. 
"Show us your chopper, the bell-end, one testicle," she yells. 
Laughing off the comment, he replies: "You’ll see it, soon enough." Read More 
Moments later, Chloe then gets sexual again when she asks Jamie and Calum Best if they have masturbated in the house. Chloe Ferry has already upset some Celebrity Big Brother fans with her vulgar behaviour (Photo: MTV) 
They both insist they haven't much to her disappointment. 
However, Calum reveals he always had “morning wood" during his first stint on Celebrity Big Brother - but that isn't a problem this series apparently. 
Jessica then teases him: "You’re getting old now aren’t you Calum?" The reality star's antics get even worse when she asks Jamie O'Hara if she can see his penis (Photo: TV Grab) 
Somehow, we don't Chloe's antics will impress Celebrity Big Brother viewers given their response to her first day in the house last night. 
The Geordie Shore was blasted by fans after she stripped virtually naked on her very first night in the house. 
She then exposed her boobs and bum after getting drunk and her fellow housemates and stunned audiences were quick to comment. Chloe also starts a conversation about masturbation (Photo: Channel 5) 
"Grab a towel and wrap your t*ts up," Jamie O'Hara tells her as the reality star struggles to cover herself up with a towel. 
"Wrap your top up because we're all respectful... or just get your a** out," Calum Best adds. 
Oh dear... 
*Celebrity Big Brother is on Channel 5 tonight at 9pm Like us on Facebook
